entity1.name: Colors
entity1.description: A visual perceptual property corresponding to the categories called red, blue, yellow, etc.

entity2.name: Psychological Well-being
entity2.description: The state of being comfortable, healthy, or happy, particularly in a mental and emotional sense.

entity3.name: color psychology
entity3.description: The study of how colors influence human behavior and emotions.

entity4.name: blues
entity4.description: A color often associated with calmness and tranquility.

entity5.name: yellows
entity5.description: A color known for its energizing and uplifting effects.

entity6.name: red
entity6.description: A primary color that is often associated with energy, warmth, and passion.

entity7.name: orange
entity7.description: A secondary color between red and yellow on the spectrum, often associated with warmth and enthusiasm.

entity8.name: yellow
entity8.description: A primary color that is bright and cheerful, often associated with sunshine and happiness.

entity9.name: blue
entity9.description: A primary color often associated with calmness and tranquility.

entity10.name: green
entity10.description: A secondary color that is often linked to nature, growth, and relaxation.

entity11.name: purple
entity11.description: A tertiary color that can evoke feelings of luxury, creativity, and calmness.

entity12.name: bedrooms
entity12.description: A room in a house or apartment primarily used for sleeping.

entity13.name: meditation rooms
entity13.description: A designated space used for the practice of meditation, often designed to promote relaxation and mental clarity.

entity14.name: red
entity14.description: A primary color that is often associated with strong emotions and physical responses such as excitement and increased heart rate.

entity15.name: red
entity15.description: A primary color often associated with strong emotions and used to attract attention.

entity16.name: advertising
entity16.description: The business of designing and writing advertisements for products or services.

entity17.name: blue
entity17.description: A primary color often associated with calmness and tranquility.

entity18.name: bedrooms
entity18.description: Private rooms in a house or apartment primarily used for sleeping.

entity19.name: offices
entity19.description: Workspaces where professional tasks are performed, often in a business setting.

entity20.name: yellow
entity20.description: A bright primary color often associated with sunlight, happiness, and positivity.

entity21.name: happiness
entity21.description: A positive emotional state characterized by feelings of joy, contentment, satisfaction, and well-being.

entity22.name: positivity
entity22.description: An optimistic attitude or approach to life that focuses on the good aspects of situations and people.

entity23.name: serotonin
entity23.description: A chemical messenger in the brain that helps regulate mood, sleep, and other functions. It is often associated with feelings of well-being and happiness.

entity24.name: brain
entity24.description: The central organ of the nervous system, located in the skull, which controls most bodily activities including thought, movement, sensation, and memory.

entity25.name: yellow
entity25.description: A bright primary color often associated with sunshine, happiness, and cheerfulness.

entity26.name: black
entity26.description: A color often associated with power, authority, and sophistication, but can also evoke feelings of sadness or mystery.

entity27.name: white
entity27.description: A color often associated with purity and innocence in Western cultures, but linked to death and mourning in some Eastern cultures.

entity28.name: Western cultures
entity28.description: A collective term for the cultural practices and beliefs of societies primarily found in Europe and North America, among others.

entity29.name: Eastern cultures
entity29.description: A collective term for the cultural practices and beliefs of societies primarily found in Asia and parts of the Middle East.

entity30.name: blue bedroom
entity30.description: A room in a house or apartment used for sleeping, painted in a calming blue color.

entity31.name: red workout space
entity31.description: An area designated for physical exercise, decorated with an energizing red color to promote activity and motivation.

entity32.name: yellow kitchen
entity32.description: A room in a house or apartment where food is prepared and cooked, painted in a cheerful yellow color to enhance mood and positivity.
